                       throws JSONException
        Throws:
        JSONException

      • parseRaw

        public static JSONArray parseRaw(JSONTokener tokener,
                                 java.lang.String jsonPath)
                          throws JSONException
        Very simple JSONPath decoder which always creates a JSONArray as result. If the jsonPath does not point to an array, but to an object, the object is placed within an array artificially. Therefore all kind of objects can be addressed. Examples for JSONPaths: $ - the whole json is the array
        Parameters:
        tokener - contains the parsed JSON
        jsonPath - a path as defined by http://goessner.net/articles/JsonPath/
        Returns:
        a JSONArray with the data part of a console query
        Throws:
        JSONException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
